original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 305.80 & 306.20 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields slightly up at close on Wednesday and the rupee closed stronger at 305.80/306.20 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 27.25/75 percent, steady from 27.10/60 percent at Tuesday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 29.00/50 percent, steady from 29.30/30.00 per cent at last close.
The rupee closed at 305.80/306.20 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 311.00/50. (Colombo/May17/2023)
